last_episode_to_air.name: Payneful Choices
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nyla is left with life-altering decisions.

name: The Paynes
overview: Follow Ella and Curtis Payne through the ups and downs of retirement in Florida. A “House of Payne” spin-off.

episodes.name: A Surprise for the Payne's
episodes.overview: In the premiere, Curtis and the rest of the Payne family take a road trip to Florida where Ella receives a stunning surprise.

episodes.name: Revelations of Payne
episodes.overview: Ella fumes after Curtis makes a life-changing decision without her input; Curtis discovers that he was duped into a bad investment.

episodes.name: A Confrontation Of Payne
episodes.overview: Curtis seeks retribution after he realizes that he was swindled; Ella has a change of heart after visiting the local church and meets a beautiful young woman in need.

episodes.name: Cleaning Up The Payne
episodes.overview: The Paynes begin to settle into their new life with the help of their cousins; Ella is concerned about Nyla's disappearance.

episodes.name: A Fugitive In Payne
episodes.overview: Nyla fears that her actions will leave her with life-altering consequences; Ella attempts to save the day.

episodes.name: The Waiting Game
episodes.overview: Curtis and Ella continue to wait for the police to arrive at the laundromat after Nyla disappears; later, the children reveal startling news about Nyla's relationship with Kendrick.

episodes.name: Better Than Nothing
episodes.overview: Curtis and Ella debate about taking in Nyla and her kids. Ella talks to Nyla about how her relationship is affecting her children.

episodes.name: A Payneful Night
episodes.overview: Nyla's disrespectful behavior is wearing out her welcome at the Payne's house.

episodes.name: The World Wide Payne
episodes.overview: Curtis needs to place an online order for parts to get the laundromat up and running, but he doesn't know how to use the computer. Ella discovers Curtis knows how to do one thing on the computer.

episodes.name: Lynn's Punishment
episodes.overview: Ella confronts Nyla after Lynn has suspicious nightmares; later, Nyla confronts Kendrick about Lynn's accusations.

episodes.name: Making Repairs
episodes.overview: After Ella learns that Curtis is trying to make his own repairs at the laundromat, she makes plans to involve professionals; Kendrick visits Nyla to apologize; Nyla finally comes clean with Ella and has a heart-to-heart with her children.

episodes.name: Payneful Repairs
episodes.overview: Curtis and Ella learn some troubling news about Nyla.

episodes.name: A Payneful Dispute
episodes.overview: The family is in an uproar after Ryan tells Joann about some money that one of Ella's contractors found in the laundromat.

episodes.name: A Payneful Cry
episodes.overview: Nyla attempts to mediate between the Paynes and Joann after Ella and Curtis are served with court papers.

episodes.name: Keep The Payne Away
episodes.overview: Ella wants to surprise Curtis with the new renovations, but Curtis has other plans.

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: Curtis tries playing matchmaker for Terrence and Nyla, but Nyla isn't very interested; Curtis tries to set Terrance and Nyla up on a blind date.

episodes.name: secret lovers
episodes.overview: The Paynes discover that Nyla hasn't been completely truthful.

episodes.name: Making Her Honest
episodes.overview: Nyla and Kendrick reveal some very interesting news to the Paynes.

episodes.name: A Payneful Bounce
episodes.overview: After much needed work, renovations on the Laundromat are finally complete. Curtis and Ella are excited until federal agents intervene.

episodes.name: A Payne Family Secret
episodes.overview: The FBI threatens to take the Laundromat due to Uncle Robert's past indiscretions. When Curtis and Ella turn to JoAnn for answers, they discover that she knows more than she has previously told them.

episodes.name: Payneful Situations
episodes.overview: Ella and Curtis need more money to operate the laundromat.

episodes.name: Home Alone
episodes.overview: Nyla may not be able to pay for her latest mistake.

episodes.name: The Outsiders
episodes.overview: Nyla wears out her welcome with Curtis.

episodes.name: An Impasse
episodes.overview: Ella stands firm on her decision with Nyla.

episodes.name: No Room For Payne
episodes.overview: Curtis realizes he was right about Nyla all along.

episodes.name: No Sticks Or Bricks
episodes.overview: Curtis reconciles within his household.

episodes.name: A Payneful Hunch
episodes.overview: Curtis and Nyla make a truce.

episodes.name: Syncopal
episodes.overview: Nyla meets a handsome man named Terrance.

episodes.name: A Payneful Confrontation
episodes.overview: Confusion leads to a confrontation in the Payne household.

episodes.name: Payneful Business
episodes.overview: Terrance is angered to find out that Nyla has been the victim of an abusive relationship.

episodes.name: A Payneful Proposition
episodes.overview: The Paynes run out of ideas to save the laundromat, but Terrance comes up with a solution that could help everyone.

episodes.name: Payneful Partnership
episodes.overview: Curtis realizes he has exhausted all of his options and decides to go into business with Terrance.

episodes.name: Social Media'd
episodes.overview: Nyla and Kendrick reconnect.

episodes.name: A Giraffe and a Bull
episodes.overview: Terrance and Curtis struggle for power over the Laundromat.

episodes.name: Payneful Choices
episodes.overview: Nyla is left with life-altering decisions.
